extendedInfo.description: Blurring the lines between games and interactive art, Contre Jour welcomes you to a hauntingly beautiful world shaped by the interplay of light and darkness. Use your finger to morph the landscape, propelling the mysterious creature Petit to safety. Pull, swipe, and tap gadgets such as tendrils, air geysers, and pulleys to complete clever puzzles. Set to a poignant orchestrated soundtrack from composer David Ari Leon, Contre Jour both delights and bedevils from start to finish. **Runs beautifully on tablets**Contre Jour Highlights â¢ 5 chapters featuring 100 unique levels, as well as 300 collectable lights, will have you playing for hours and hours. â¢ Use extremely intuitive controls to change the environment around you. â¢ 12 different interactive elements to master; portals, slingshots, tentacles, blowers and more. â¢ Stunning visual style places Contre Jour in a league of itâs own â simply one of the most beautiful games of the year. â¢ Rich, organic and original soundtrack by David Ari Leon perfectly matches Petitâs journey. Get some headphones and lose yourself in the world of Contre Jour. â¢ Unlock a variety of achievements as you play, can you find them all?

reviews.title: Well done.
reviews.comment: Beautiful game. Runs perfectly, and has great visuals and immersive music. Physics ftw also.
reviews.author: Jason Hoffman

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: Beautiful game, wonderful music. Definitely my new favorite game.
reviews.author: Aubrey Dyson

reviews.title: Soo beautiful !
reviews.comment: I love this game ! it\'s incredible & worth every penny so soothing to my eyes and senses. Just awesome.
reviews.author: kendra black

reviews.title: Good design, but...
reviews.comment: Not my thing. It\'s pretty and has a sleek design, but I can\'t stay interested in games without a point, without any sort of story or tension. If I had a goal other than collecting lights and entering portals, I\'d be more interested.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: I am so glad to see this game on Android! I loved it on my wife\'s iPad, and now get to have it on my Nexus 7! Great physics puzzler with wonderful music. Totally worth it!
reviews.author: Adam Daab

reviews.title: Worth the buy
reviews.comment: Kind of like Cut The Rope meets World Of Goo. Definitely a buy if you\'re a fan of either game and/or you\'re looking for a relaxing, artistic venture. The sound and visuals are superb.
reviews.author: Alec Maestas

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Previous reviews were correct, highly addictive, great graphics & music. I normally turn off sounds on games but I like this music. Installed on my Galaxy Stellar phone. No problems with download or play. Well worth $2.
reviews.author: Taxoof Nanney

reviews.title: Good Puzzler for GN2
reviews.comment: Ran smooth without any glitches on my Galaxy Note 2. Similar to Cut the Rope (but different!), but with better art and music. Fun game, yet I can\'t play it while laying down... as it always puts me to sleep.
reviews.author: Warren Malupo

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The concept is interesting, but unfortunately I didn\'t get to try the game as it hangs on the main menu.  Doesn\'t work on ICS Xperia Go/Advance.
reviews.author: Yana M

reviews.title: Ok.
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why so many people compare this to world of goo. Despite its appearance, the gameplay is actually the same as cut the rope. It\'s pretty, but the concept is unoriginal, and the supposed \"poignant\" music is little more than a tinkling piano. I much prefer feeding candy to omnom.
reviews.author: Avia Dell\'Oste

reviews.title: Stunning
reviews.comment: This game is very relaxed and calm. Play it if you want to just relax and not get stressed out because you can\'t win. Amazing soundtrack, one of the best on a game.
reviews.author: Collin W.

reviews.title: Amazing...
reviews.comment: This game works great on Galaxy Tab 2 7.0. Very calming and relaxing. If I could give more stars, I would.
reviews.author: David Watson

reviews.title: Randomly closes
reviews.comment: This game looks really fascinating but i cant play it because everytime i click on the first level it will close or sometimes freeze. Please fix this soon i would love to play this game.
reviews.author: Dusty Rolufs

reviews.title: I havn\'t had a glitch
reviews.comment: It\'s a wonderful and beautiful game. If you like \"world of goo\", \"angry birds\", \"where\'s my water\" or \"cut the rope\" than this is a perfect game
reviews.author: Wuzi Mu

reviews.title: My touch 4G
reviews.comment: The game deleted all of my saved content! Now I have to start all over... Discouraging. :(
reviews.author: James Mitchell

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: Absolutely loved it! Weird and quirky, great music, amazing physics. Awesome game play!
reviews.author: John Prevette

reviews.title: Not Working
reviews.comment: Bought, Downloaded,  Tried : Not loading, Money wasted, Time lost, That\'s a wrap!!!
reviews.author: Jean Ducasse

reviews.title: Sad Catt.
reviews.comment: This is the first game I have ever payed money for, and it won\'t let me play. I must have reinstalled it eight or ten times, still always gets stuck somewhere in the menus and startup screens. So much for paying for a game ever again.
reviews.author: Catt Rembrandt

reviews.title: Crashes at open
reviews.comment: Would like to experience this game. But won\'t open!!! Please fix. RAZR MAXX. 4.1.1
reviews.author: David Grisham

reviews.title: fun and gorgeous and chill all at once!
reviews.comment: Puzzle physics game with stunning animation! Totally fun and addictive with excellent action!
reviews.author: Leilani Berry
